verses.verse: "So it shall be <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> upon you, the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and you <S%H7725>call<s%> [them] to <S%H3824>mind<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5080>banished<s%> you,

and you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> Him with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H5315>soul<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> you and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%>

then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7725>restore<s%> you from <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> and <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on you, and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6327>scattered<s%> you.

<S%H518>"If<s%> your <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> are at the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H8064>earth,<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you, and from <S%H8033>there<s%> He will <S%H3947>bring<s%> you back.

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your fathers <S%H1>possessed,<s%> and you shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; and He will <S%H3423>prosper<s%> you and <S%H3190>multiply<s%> you <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> your fathers.

"Moreover the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of your <S%H2233>descendants,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you may <S%H9132>live.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>inflict<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H423>curses<s%> on your <S%H340>enemies<s%> and on those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you, <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> you.

"And you shall <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3498>prosper<s%> you <S%H3498>abundantly<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> in the <S%H6529>offspring<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%> and in the <S%H6529>offspring<s%> of your <S%H929>cattle<s%> and in the <S%H6529>produce<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you for <S%H9185>good,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your fathers;

<S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H2708>statutes<s%> which are <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H7725>turn<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

"For <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> is not <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H6381>difficult<s%> for you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> is it out of <S%H7350>reach.<s%>

"It is not in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that you should <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>'Who<s%> will <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for us to <S%H3947>get<s%> it for us and make us <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, that we may <S%H6213>observe<s%> it?'

<S%H3808>"Nor<s%> is it <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> that you should <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>'Who<s%> will <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> for us to <S%H3947>get<s%> it for us and make us <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, that we may <S%H6213>observe<s%> it?'
"But the <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> you, in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> that you may <S%H6213>observe<s%> it.
<S%H7200>"See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H9132>life<s%> and <S%H9185>prosperity,<s%> and <S%H4194>death<s%> and <S%H9563>adversity;<s%>

in that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H1870>ways<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and His <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> may <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H935>entering<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H6437>turns<s%> <S%H6437>away<s%> and you will not <S%H8085>obey,<s%> but are <S%H5080>drawn<s%> <S%H5080>away<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them,

I <S%H5046>declare<s%> to you <S%H3117>today<s%> that you shall surely perish. You shall not <S%H6>prolong<s%> [your] <S%H6>days<s%> in the <S%H748>land<s%> <S%H3117>where<s%> <S%H127><s%> you are <S%H834>crossing<s%> the <S%H8033>Jordan<s%> to <S%H5674>enter<s%> and <S%H3383>possess<s%> it.

"I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against you <S%H3117>today,<s%> that I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H9132>life<s%> and <S%H4194>death,<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse.<s%> So <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H9132>life<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> you and your <S%H2233>descendants,<s%>

by <S%H157>loving<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> by <S%H8085>obeying<s%> His <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and by <S%H1692>holding<s%> <S%H1692>fast<s%> to Him; for <S%H1931>this<s%> is your <S%H9132>life<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> of your <S%H3117>days,<s%> that you may <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers, to <S%H1>Abraham,<s%> <S%H85>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3327>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H3290>give<s%> them. "
